title: Eye-Dropper Gaming Recruiting! Serious Team.
body:
Hello everyone! http://i.imgur.com/YiIUgT1.jpg

**Welcome to Eye-Dropper Gaming**
I am Mad Dog and Eye-Dropper Gaming is a new project/company of mine I am starting up and right now I'm looking for players to represent Eye-Dropper Gaming.

Explaining the company, I make websites for other companies and with this I get money and I can make a team and maybe pay for new gear if we ever get that far but for now I'm just looking for players.

Considering season 5 is just around the corner I hope I'll be able to make a team to get into a plat or more 5v5 team.

* TOP: N/A
* MID: N/A
* JUNGLE: N/A
* ADC: N/A
* SUPPORT: N/A

Application if interested

**IGN**:
**Age**:
**Rank**:
**Favourite Position**:
**Favourite Champs**:
**How long have you been playing League?**:
**A little bit about yourself**:

Thank you for reading this and if you're interested apply.

I will add you on League and do a bit more questioning then add you on Skype.

~ **Mad Dog Muller**

replies.body:
IGN: Text

Age: 21

Rank: Diamond V

Favourite Position: Support and ADC 

Favourite Champs: Lulu, Janna, Thresh, Lee Sin, Caitlyn, Graves, Lucian. Not that I ever play Lee Sin as ADC or Support but he's always fun to play so goes on my favourite list haha :D

How long have you been playing League?: I've been playing league for about 3 years now. In those 3 years I've suffered the devastating NA Ping and topped a rank of Gold in NA moving on to OCE I climbed like never before and reached Plat in the first quarter of Season 4 ending up in Diamond mid Season 4 all the way through to Season 5. Hoping to climb higher though.

A little bit about yourself: I live in Melbourne and working at a hotel in the CBD where I have a pretty decent paying job as a waiter. Apart from League, I have a thing for cars and also have a horrible impulsive behaviour where I spend money on %%%% I end up not really using LOLOL.. My dream is to one day become a pilot. I have 6 hours of flight time in my pilots log book and hoping to add more hours to be able to actually fly haha. I'm casual when it comes to gaming unless I'm motivated. I hope this team will become my motivation where I will destroy JEVRFA WSGFDOLAK EVERYTHING  M,K.DASFYUCUK FUYCK YES {{summoner:14}}

IGN: XSirCution
Age: 18
Rank: Diamond 5
Favourite Position: Top > Mid > Support > ADC > Jungle
Favourite Champs: Shen, Riven, Zed
How long have I been playing for: 2 years
A little bit about myself: I've always wanted to be in a team since I watched season 2 worlds and so its been a dream of mine to join a serious team and reach the top. I'm sure there is plenty of people much better than I am, but I'm dedicated to do whatever it takes to surpass every single one of them.

IGN: Fred the Bear
Age: Manufactured on the 4th October 1998
Rank: Bronze 6
Favourite Position: Roaming
Favourite Champs: Urgot, Skarner, Tibbers, Teemo
How long have you been playing League?: 69 years
A little bit about yourself: As yu no I is saventeen yars old. I was made in Aphghanistun. I is pro leuge of lagend playa who is stuk in brunze 6 becuz of bad tems. I shud be in shallenjour but rito choose to put troll playas in every game. I am emotionless as i is a bear. My england is very gud so eazy comunicasion amung the teem. I lik to eat biscut evrydey and drunk tea. 

ty, hop i get in the teem

IGN: Mcnessyj
Age: 16
Rank: Diamond 5
Favourite Position: ADC/Support
Favourite Champs: Graves, Corki, Lucian, Caitlyn and Vayne || Thresh, Janna, Braum, Blitzcrank and Alistar.
How long have you been playing League?: I've been playing League since December 2012 (Which is roughly the very end of Season 2).
A little bit about yourself: I am an enthusiastic player who plays to win. I have lots of team experience, being the main shot caller for most of them. And also I live in New Zealand :).

IGN: Masimo100
Age:19
Rank:d5
Favourite Position: Mid
Favourite Champs: Kha zix Twisted Fate Syndra Xerath Yasuo
How long have you been playing League?: Since beta
A little bit about yourself: 19 year old from Melbourne, no lifer at the moment haha

nice rank bb

AND U DONT PLAY TF

IGN:SakuraKitsune
Age: 25
Rank: Plat 5
Favourite Position: Support
Favourite Champs: Sona, Soraka, Leona (capable of playing all Meta supports and a lot of non-meta)
How long have you been playing League?: Since Season 1, but only got competitive last season
A little bit about yourself: I'm a pretty laid back guy, I'm quite at first but I speak a lot when I get comfortable around me. I play LoL for at least a few hours every day, I have more free time but I tend not to play solo too much. I take ranked very seriously but not to the point of extremes (raging and trash talking).

IGN: M3 SO HORNY
Age: 22
Rank: Plat 4
Favourite Position: Jungle, Mid, Top, ADC ( a bit sick about support but can still supp )
Favourite Champs: Malzahar, Syndra ( mid prefs with some others ), Jarvan, Hecarim, Fidd ( jungle and there are somes more ), Irelia, Jayce, Yasuo, Jarvan, Trynd, Maokai ( top and some others too ), Caitlyn, Jinx, Vayne ( ADC )
How long have you been playing League?: About 2 years
A little bit about yourself: Love having laughs with people, i'm very friendly, taking the game serious when its ranked but not flaming or ragging if someone is doing bad, i often record game with gamecaster ( but not publishing on twitch yet . ) . In real life, i'm working on sites, i'm a foreman, playing mostly every night after work, + weekend.

IGN: Safehouse
Age: 22
Rank: plat 4 and climbing fast
Favourite Position: mid and jungle
Favourite Champs: mid: katarina, fizz, brand. Jungle: Warwick , yi, amumu. Play most champs in both of those roles though
How long have you been playing League?: almost 3 years
A little bit about yourself: have played games for as long as I can remember. I have a YouTube channel that I have run for over a year now and have a fair bit of experience in the gaming world. Not working too much so plenty of time for league haha

IGN: ChupaChups

Age:15 Going to be 16 in a few months!

Rank:Gold 2 and climbing

Favourite Position: Mid & ADC

Favourite Champs: Any mid lane assassins, but can play almost every midlaner! For Adc's i like the mid game power spike champs like corki and lucian!

How long have you been playing League?: I've played since season 3 but stopped for about 6 months then start back up again about 6 months ago! =]

A little bit about yourself: I'm a out going, loves to have a laugh, muck around ! but when its time to be serious I can control myself! I very very rarely rage, im very mature for my age! My parents are also deaf so thats a little interesting i guess! =]

Wishfuljellyfish 
Age 16
Rank diamond/challenger
Position: Can play anything just sick of ADC atm
Champs: all champs owned, about 5-10 champs any role
Played since season 1
abit about me: umm, I Always lose lane to "wrekt" in the finals of tournies, I trash talk anyone who picks on team mates :), I zone out in champ select and counter pick my self :\ ,

IGN: D0Minator
Age: 18
Rank: Platinum 4
Favourite Position: ADC
Favourite Champs: Graves, Lucian, Jinx, Vayne (can/willing to pick up any champ though for team purposes)
How long have you been playing League?: Since Season 1, started playing ranked in Season 2 though.
A little bit about yourself: I'm usually just an average relaxed kind of guy outside the game that's usually always keen for a laugh. Currently looking for work at the moment which would have an impact on my availability in the future. Also, just finished school so I'm somewhat looking forward to university this year. For now though, I'm available for serious things (practice, scrims, etc) from 7PM - whenever.

IGN: Tazo
Age: 23
Rank: Silver III
Favourite Position: Jungle
Favourite Champs: I play everything, and my favourites change often, at the moment it's Jarvan IV, Elise, Shaco, Nocturne, Maokai, Lee
How long have you been playing League?: 2 years I think
A little bit about yourself: I'm James, I work at a hospital of which I won't disclose in a forum, I live in Sydney currently and don't do much other than work and play League while occasionally visiting my mates in my home town.
I am Available essentially all days unless I get called in for nightshift, but I will have notice of this and it's not very often that it happens.

IGN: Jigokusai
Age: 22
Rank: Gold 5 - Decayed from Gold 1
Favourite Position: Jungle/Support
Favourite Champs: j4, lee, gragas, wu kong / thresh, leona, blitz
How long have you been playing League?: 3 years
A little bit about yourself: 22 year old living in NZ, fluent english, happy and co-operative, i never rage and i always look back on my old games with replay to find key weaknesses, and improve on them, i take ranked (esp. ranked 5s) very seriously, i am talkative and sometimes too talkative :P
